text: Reminder: Please send me the updated budget for the road safety campaign by Friday.
The pilot collaboration with Aarhus municipality has been approved and will start next month.
Several complaints have been received about delays in our shipment tracking updates.
Can you review the draft communication for the new university course and send comments?
Internal note: The audit team will visit the ministry on 12 June for preliminary meetings.
We need a decision on whether to extend the contract with the current IT vendor.
Just a quick reminder about tomorrow’s workshop with the private partners.
Parents have written about confusing bicycle lane signage near the school.
Please compile a one-page summary of last year’s sports participation statistics.
The new guidelines for documenting project risks are now available on the intranet.
Stakeholders are worried about inconsistent data across different reports.
Could you propose three dates for a meeting with the municipality and send them out?
We must decide today whether to include the new indicators in the performance report.
Just letting you know that the shipment to Singapore cleared customs earlier than expected.
Reminder: Final edits for the annual traffic safety report are due by end of day.
Several emails from citizens highlight unclear rules on helmet use for children.
Please draft a short brief for management on the main findings from the audit.
The sports federation has confirmed their participation in next month’s event.
We need your feedback on the proposed changes to the collaboration agreement.
Note: The external evaluation report will be shared with all partners next week.
